metadata.name: Heartbeats in Harmony
metadata.description:
Heartbeats in Harmony is Menji's first NFT that serves as digital authentication for a 6ft x 8ft mural that menji had painted IRL. 

By owning this special 1/1 you also own the rights to the physical piece, granting you complete ownership of the physical masterpiece. 

As the owner, you will have the option to have the physical painting shipped to your home (shipping not included) or choose to have it held by Studio Menji for future gallery showings or events. This means you can choose to display it in your home or allow it to be admired by art lovers from all over the world.
